com.mygame.entities

Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygame.entities.Sprite
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Sprite>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Arrow, Gold, Item, Player, Slime

    public abstract class Sprite
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Sprite>
    All displayable objects should inherit from this class, contains all elements needed for creating physics object in box2d's world, also contains hash map for animations and current animation that will be displayed during render

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Sprite.Direction
      Contains string name of 8 directions

    • Constructor Detail

      • Sprite

        public Sprite(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.BodyDef.BodyType type,
              float positionX,
              float positionY,
              float linearDamping,
              com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world,
              float restitution,
              float density,
              float friction)
        Parameters:
        type - type of box2d's body (kinematic, dynamic or static)
        positionX - x coordinate of spawning position
        positionY - y coordinate of spawning position
        linearDamping - used for reducing linear speed
        world - box2d world object in which collider of an object will be spawned
        restitution - "bounciness" of a collider
        density - how heavy collider will be compared to its size
        friction - how much velocity will be subtract after collision

      • addAnimation

        public void addAnimation(java.lang.String name,
                         com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion[] reg,
                         float delay)
        Parameters:
        name - string identifier for animation
        reg - array of frames which animations will be made of
        delay - delay between frames

      • addDirectionalAnimation

        public void addDirectionalAnimation(java.lang.String name,
                                    com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture texture,
                                    int framesPerDirection,
                                    float delay)
        Parameters:
        name - string identifier for animation
        texture - texture that contains 8-direction animation
        framesPerDirection - how much frames one direction contains
        delay - delay between frames

      • addDirectionalAnimation

        public void addDirectionalAnimation(java.lang.String name,
                                    com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture texture,
                                    int framesPerDirection,
                                    float delay,
                                    boolean loop)
        Parameters:
        name - string identifier for animation
        texture - texture that contains 8-direction animation
        framesPerDirection - how much frames one direction contains
        delay - delay between frames
        loop - is animation going to loop

      • addDirectionalAnimation

        public void addDirectionalAnimation(java.lang.String name,
                                    com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture texture,
                                    int framesPerDirection,
                                    float delay,
                                    boolean loop,
                                    boolean reverse)
        Parameters:
        name - string identifier for animation
        texture - texture that contains 8-direction animation
        framesPerDirection - how much frames one direction contains
        delay - delay between frames
        loop - is animation going to loop
        reverse - are frames going to be displayed in opposite order

      • defineMainCollider

        protected void defineMainCollider(float radius,
                                  short categoryBits,
                                  java.lang.Object userData)
        Must be called once from inheriting class to complete the process of creating box2d body
        Parameters:
        radius - radius of a circle collider
        categoryBits - collision mask, should consist of collision's mask bits that are defined in Constants class (few collision bits can be connected with OR operator)
        userData - user data that can be accessed in contact listener (usually "this" that allows to store whole object that it concerns)

      • defineMainCollider

        protected void defineMainCollider(float radius,
                                  short categoryBits,
                                  java.lang.Object userData,
                                  boolean isSensor)
        Must be called once from inheriting class to complete the process of creating box2d body
        Parameters:
        radius - radius of a circle collider
        categoryBits - collision mask, should consist of collision's mask bits that are defined in Constants class (few collision bits can be connected with OR operator)
        userData - user data that can be accessed in contact listener (usually "this" that allows to store whole object that it concerns)
        isSensor - is collider going to be a sensor (box2d will just listen for contacts but body itself wont collide with another body)

      • defineMainCollider

        protected void defineMainCollider(float width,
                                  float height,
                                  short categoryBits,
                                  java.lang.Object userData)
        Must be called once from inheriting class to complete the process of creating box2d body
        Parameters:
        width - width of a box collider
        height - height of a box collider
        categoryBits - collision mask, should consist of collision's mask bits that are defined in Constants class (few collision bits can be connected with OR operator)
        userData - user data that can be accessed in contact listener (usually "this" that allows to store whole object that it concerns)

      • defineMainCollider

        protected void defineMainCollider(float width,
                                  float height,
                                  short categoryBits,
                                  java.lang.Object userData,
                                  boolean isSensor)
        Must be called once from inheriting class to complete the process of creating box2d body
        Parameters:
        width - width of a box collider
        height - height of a box collider
        categoryBits - collision mask, should consist of collision's mask bits that are defined in Constants class (few collision bits can be connected with OR operator)
        userData - user data that can be accessed in contact listener (usually "this" that allows to store whole object that it concerns)
        isSensor - is collider going to be a sensor (box2d will just listen for contacts but body itself wont collide with another body)

      • synchronizeDirectionalAnimation

        public void synchronizeDirectionalAnimation(java.lang.String name,
                                            Animation animation)
        Procedure will synchronize all 8 directions of given directional animation, providing that all of them will be in same state
        Parameters:
        name - name of the animation to synchronize
        animation - animation that "name" will be synchronized with

      • resetDirectionalAnimation

        public void resetDirectionalAnimation(java.lang.String name)
        Resets all 8 direction's of given animation
        Parameters:
        name - name of the animation to reset
